# Authorizations Flow {.unnumbered}

## How Can I Access Databrary?
```{mermaid}
graph
  A[I am a] --> B[Student] --> H[Request authorization from your Supervising Professor]
  A --> C[Lab Staff] --> H[Request authorization from your Supervising Professor]
  A --> D[PostDoc] --> H[Request authorization from your Supervising Professor]
  A --> F[Faculty] --> I[Request authorization from your Institution]
  A --> G[Institution]
 
  click H "https://databrary.github.io/guide/for-investigators/requesting-access.html#registering-as-an-authorized-investigator-at-an-institution" "link to requesting-access-affiliates.qmd"
  click I "https://databrary.github.io/guide/for-investigators/requesting-access.html#registering-as-an-affiliate-of-an-authorized-investigator" "Link to requesting-access.qmd"
```

## User Perspective {-}

```{mermaid}
flowchart
  A[Register - Click here] --> B[Confirm account in email] -- Yes --> C[Request Authorization From]
  C --> D[Existing Institution] --> H(Receive Databrary Email 'Information Required to Process...')
  C --> E[New Institution] --> H(Receive Databrary Email 'Next steps')
  C --> G[Authorized Investigator] --> I{Authorized Investigator reviews/grants Affiliate Access}
  A --> F[No Request] --> J(Receive Databrary Email 'How to request access')
  B -- No --> F[No Request]
  
  click A "https://nyu.databrary.org/user/register" "This is a link"
```

## Admin Perspective {-}

```{mermaid}
flowchart
  A[Request Type]--> B[New Institution] --> I{View Institution Profile - Eligible?} -- Yes --> G
  A --> C[Existing Institution] --> G{View Person Institutional Profile - Eligible? } 
  G -- Yes --> H(Send Email 'Next steps')
  G -- No --> J(Send Email 'To Process Request')
  I -- No --> K(Send Email 'Ineligible for access')
  A --> D[Authorized Investigator] --> L[No Email Action Required]
  A --> E[No Request] --> F(Send Email 'To Initiate Authorization')
```
